name: Onyx
fullDescription: Onyx is a Windows-inspired desktop environment built in React that serves as my interactive portfolio. It features a taskbar, launcher, and draggable/resizable windows, creating a unique and engaging way to explore my work and background.

name: Stirixi
fullDescription: Stirixi is an engineering analytics platform that helps CTOs and engineering managers measure team performance by unifying GitHub activity data with ML-driven insights. It won Best Use of Solana and Microsoft for Startups ($25k credits) at the AI ATL hackathon, featuring a Next.js dashboard, analytics models, and blockchain-based proof-of-work credentials.

name: Interview Prepper
fullDescription: Interview Prepper is an AI-driven interview preparation platform that helps job seekers practice and improve their interviewing skills. Built with Next.js and OpenAI APIs, it launched to over 1,000 active users within two weeks and achieved a 70%+ onboarding completion rate through personalized blueprint creation workflows.

name: StudyBuddy
fullDescription: StudyBuddy is an AI-powered study suite that provides accurate, course-specific help by grounding LLM responses in verified lecture content. It features a context-aware chatbot with source-verifiable answers and a two-pass quiz generator that creates relevant multiple-choice questions directly from your study materials.

name: SmartCare.ai
fullDescription: SmartCare.ai is a healthcare management platform that parses C-CDA medical documents, visualizes health trends, and predicts patient risks using AI. Built during the Hacklytics 2025 hackathon, it features interactive dashboards, patient summary generation, and integrates with Google Gemini for intelligent health insights.

name: AI Q&A Tool
fullDescription: AI Q&A Tool is a RAG-powered system that answers questions from uploaded documents using OCR and semantic search. It combines Milvus vector store for retrieval with LLMs for generation, packaged in a streamlined Streamlit interface and deployed via Docker for consistent performance.

name: Agent Arena
fullDescription: Agent Arena is a Flask and React system built during AI ATL 2024 that analyzes LLM behavior in competitive multi-agent games. It provides unified model interfaces and visualizations to study how different AI models perform in strategic, competitive environments.

name: Dungeon Crawler
fullDescription: Dungeon Crawler is a 2D Android game built with Java using MVVM architecture and design patterns including Singleton, Strategy, Observer, Factory, and Decorator. It features movement mechanics, enemy AI, collision detection, scoring, power-ups, and a leaderboard system, developed through Agile sprints with comprehensive JUnit testing.
